File: Datastructures/MaxHeap.ts

                        
                        import Heap = require('./Heap');
                        
                        /**
                         * The MaxHeap class provides the main functionality of a heap, keeping the maximum on the top.
                         *
                         * @class MaxHeap
                         * @extends Heap
                         */
                        class MaxHeap extends Heap {
                        
                            protected _type = Heap.MAX;
                        
                        }
                        
                        export = MaxHeap;
